original_text: In the top basket were all kinds of baked goods for Pharaoh, but the birds were eating them out of the basket on my head.”
korean_text: 맨 윗광주리에 바로를 위하여 만든 각종 구운 음식이 있는데 새들이 내 머리의 광주리에서 그것을 먹더라

sentences.original_text: In the top basket were all kinds of baked goods for Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 꼭대기 바구니에는 바로를 위한 모든 종류의 구운 음식이 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: but the birds were eating them
out of the basket on my head
